Description
Feel like Abel from Street Fighter IV with this alternate singlet top! Get a leg up on your foes with cool MMA-style gear! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Abel de Street Fighter IV avec ce haut de costume alternatif ! Montrez à vos adversaires que vous faites du free fight ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Fühle dich mit diesem alternativen oberen Teil eines Ringertrikots wie Abel aus Street Fighter IV! Es bietet optimalen Tragekomfort! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa Abel di Street Fighter IV con la parte sopra del costume alternativo! Imponiti sui tuoi nemici con questa tenuta in stile MMA. Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte este traje alternativo (p. superior) y conviértete en Abel de Street Fighter IV! ¡El universo de MMA será tuyo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 アベルになりきることができるアレンジ ver.のシングレット （上） 総合格闘スタイルで差をつけろ！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 아벨이 되는 어렌지 ver. 도복(상의). 종합 격투 스타일을 표현하자! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Abel from Street Fighter IV with this alternate singlet top! Get a leg up on your foes with cool MMA-style gear! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
